sense.def:
To avoid something
pomeni ukrepati, da bi preprečili nekaj, kar bi se lahko zgodilo.

seg.quote: ...a book on how to avoid a heart attack.

sense.def:
To avoid doing something
pomeni, da se namenoma potrudimo, da tistega ne bi storili.

seg.quote: Thomas turned his head, trying to avoid breathing in the smoke.

sense.def:
To avoid someone or something
pomeni, da tistemu človeku ali stvari ne hodimo blizu.
